explanation: [0-0] A girl in a red top is resting her face on her right hand, looking at the mobile phone in her left hand. To the right of the girl in the red top, a boy in a blue top is looking at the girl in the red top. In front of the boy in the blue top, there is a white laptop on a brown table. The background is purple.
[0-2] Subsequently, the boy in the blue top snatches the mobile phone from the girl in the red top and breaks it.
